00023 int main(void) {
00024         init_ports();
00025         
00026         init_backlight_contrast();
00027         lcdInit();
00028         lcdClear();
00029         lcdHome();
00030         
00031         a2dInit();
00032         a2dSetPrescaler(ADC_PRESCALE_DIV16);
00033         a2dSetReference(ADC_REFERENCE_AREF);
00034         
00035         output_show_display(0);
00036         led_set_fwd(15);
00037         led_set_ref(7);
00038         led_set_vswr_state(LED_STATE_ON);
00039         delay_s(1);
00040         lcdClear();
00041         
00042         led_set_vswr_state(LED_STATE_OFF);
00043         
00044         current_coupler.fwd_scale_value[0] = 3782;
00045         current_coupler.ref_scale_value[0] = 3782;
00046         current_coupler.power_limit = 200;
00047         
00048         settings.vswr_warn_limit = 10;
00049         settings.vswr_shutdown_limit = 300;
00050         settings.led_fwd_power_high = 120;
00051         settings.led_ref_power_high = 20;
00052         
00053         output_update_leds();
00054         
00055         short res = 0;
00056         
00057         unsigned char count=0;
00058         
00059         while(1) {
00060                 status.curr_fwd_ad_value = a2dConvert10bit(ADC_CH_ADC0);
00061                 status.curr_ref_ad_value = a2dConvert10bit(ADC_CH_ADC1);
00062                 
00063                 input_calculate_power();
00064                 status.curr_vswr = input_calculate_vswr();
00065                 
00066                 if (count > 250) {
00067                         output_show_display(2);
00068                         count = 0;
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 count++;
00072                 output_update_leds();
00073                 delay_ms(1);
00074         }
00075 }
